00008 /*********************************************************************************************
00009    bodies_Allocate
00010 *********************************************************************************************/
00011 bodies_t *bodies_Allocate(){
00012   return (bodies_t *) FMB_malloc_with_check(sizeof(bodies_t));
00013 }

00028 /*********************************************************************************************
00029    bodies_Initialize_body
00030 *********************************************************************************************/
00031 void bodies_Initialize_body(bodies_t *p_b, 
00032                             bodies_ind_t body_number){
00033   bodies_Set_pos_x(p_b, body_number, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0); 
00034   bodies_Set_pos_y(p_b, body_number, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0); 
00035   bodies_Set_pos_z(p_b, body_number, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0); 
00036   bodies_Set_value(p_b, body_number, 0.0); 
00037   position_Initialize(bodies_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b, body_number)); 
00038   bodies_Set_fx(p_b, body_number, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0); 
00039   bodies_Set_fy(p_b, body_number, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0); 
00040   bodies_Set_fz(p_b, body_number, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0); 
00041 }

00048 /*********************************************************************************************
00049    find_corresponding_child
00050 *********************************************************************************************/
00051 unsigned char find_corresponding_child(position_t *p_body_position,
00052                                        position_t *p_center_position){
00053   if (position_Get_x(p_body_position) > position_Get_x(p_center_position))
00054     /* F.. */
00055     if (position_Get_y(p_body_position) > position_Get_y(p_center_position))
00056       /* F.R */
00057       if (position_Get_z(p_body_position) > position_Get_z(p_center_position))
00058         return FUR;
00059       else
00060         return FDR;
00061     else
00062       /* F.L */
00063       if (position_Get_z(p_body_position) > position_Get_z(p_center_position))
00064         return FUL;
00065       else
00066         return FDL;
00067   else
00068     /* B.. */
00069     if (position_Get_y(p_body_position) >       position_Get_y(p_center_position))
00070       /* B.R */
00071       if (position_Get_z(p_body_position) > position_Get_z(p_center_position))
00072         return BUR;
00073       else
00074         return BDR;
00075     else
00076       /* B.L */
00077       if (position_Get_z(p_body_position) > position_Get_z(p_center_position))
00078         return BUL;
00079       else
00080         return BDL;
00081 }

00110 /*********************************************************************************************
00111    body_array_Initialize
00112 *********************************************************************************************/
00113 void body_array_Initialize(body_array_t *p_b,
00114                            bodies_ind_t initial_size_allocated){
00115   p_b->nb_bodies = 0;
00116 
00117   p_b->p_bodies = 
00118     (body_t *) FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(body_t));
00119 
00120   p_b->size_allocated = initial_size_allocated;
00121 
00122 /*   p_b->thread_owner = -1; /\* for debugging only *\/ */
00123 }
00124 
00125 
00126 /*********************************************************************************************
00127    body_array_Initialize_with_bodies
00128 *********************************************************************************************/
00129 /* We assume the 'p_bodies' array has been allocated for 'nb_bodies' bodies. */
00130 void body_array_Initialize_with_bodies(body_array_t *p_b,
00131                                        body_t *p_bodies,
00132                                        bodies_ind_t nb_bodies){
00133   p_b->nb_bodies = nb_bodies;
00134 
00135   p_b->p_bodies = p_bodies;
00136 
00137   p_b->size_allocated = nb_bodies;
00138 
00139 /*   p_b->thread_owner = -1; /\* for debugging only *\/ */
00140 }
00141 
00142 
00143 /*********************************************************************************************
00144    body_array_Free
00145 *********************************************************************************************/
00146 void body_array_Free(body_array_t *p_b){
00147   p_b->nb_bodies = 0;
00148   p_b->size_allocated = 0;
00149 
00150   FMB_free(p_b->p_bodies);
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 
00155 /*********************************************************************************************
00156    body_array_Realloc_arrays
00157 *********************************************************************************************/
00158 /* Private function: */
00159 /* WARNING: this function should not too much be called 
00160  * since it may not be efficient when the new_size is greater 
00161  * than the actual size allocated. 
00162  * Indeed the arrays might be allocated one after the other
00163  * in memory and they will all be copied somewhere else 
00164  * in the memory during the 'FMB_realloc_with_check()' call ... */
00165 void body_array_Realloc_arrays(body_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t new_size){
00166 
00167   p_b->p_bodies = 
00168     (body_t *) FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_bodies,
00169                                   new_size * sizeof(body_t));
00170   p_b->size_allocated = new_size;
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 
00175 
00176 /*********************************************************************************************
00177    body_array_ClearFP
00178 *********************************************************************************************/
00179 void body_array_ClearFP(body_array_t *p_b){
00180   body_array_it_t it;
00181   /* Can be accelerated with 'memset'. */
00182   for (body_array_it_Initialize(&it, p_b);
00183        body_array_it_Is_valid(&it);
00184        body_array_it_Go2Next_NoPVS(&it)){
00185     position_Initialize(body_array_it_Get_p_force_vector(&it));
00186   }
00187 }
00188 
00189 
00190 /*********************************************************************************************
00191    body_array_Is_full
00192 *********************************************************************************************/
00193 bool body_array_Is_full(body_array_t *p_b){
00194   return (p_b->nb_bodies == p_b->size_allocated);
00195 }
00196 
00197 
00198 /*********************************************************************************************
00199    body_array_Adjust_memory
00200 *********************************************************************************************/
00201 void body_array_Adjust_memory(body_array_t *p_b){
00202   if (p_b->nb_bodies < p_b->size_allocated){
00203     body_array_Realloc_arrays(p_b, p_b->nb_bodies);
00204   }
00205 }
00206 
00207 
00208 /*********************************************************************************************
00209    body_array_Affect
00210 *********************************************************************************************/
00211 void body_array_Affect(body_array_t *p_target, body_array_t *p_src){
00212   if (p_target->size_allocated != p_src->size_allocated){
00213     body_array_Realloc_arrays(p_target, p_src->size_allocated);
00214   }
00215 
00216   memcpy(p_target->p_bodies, p_src->p_bodies, 
00217          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(body_t));
00218 
00219   p_target->nb_bodies = p_src->nb_bodies;
00220 }
00221

00224 
00225 
00226 /*********************************************************************************************
00227    body_array_Add
00228 *********************************************************************************************/
00229 void body_array_Add(body_array_t *p_b, 
00230                     body_t *p_body){
00231   if (body_array_Is_full(p_b)){
00232     /* We use +1 for the small values of p_b->size_allocated: */
00233     body_array_Realloc_arrays(p_b, (p_b->size_allocated + 1) * BODIES_EXTENSION_FACTOR);
00234   }
00235 
00236   Copy_body2body_array(p_b, 
00237                        p_b->nb_bodies,
00238                        p_body);
00239   p_b->nb_bodies++;
00240   
00241 }
00242 
00243 
00244 /*********************************************************************************************
00245    body_array_Remove
00246 *********************************************************************************************/
00247 void body_array_Remove(body_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00248   bodies_ind_t k;
00249   
00250   for (k=body_number; k<(p_b->nb_bodies - 1) ;++k){
00251     Copy_body_array2body_array(p_b, k, p_b, k+1);
00252   }
00253   p_b->nb_bodies--;
00254 }
00255 
00256 
00257 /*********************************************************************************************
00258    body_array_Display
00259 *********************************************************************************************/
00260 void body_array_Display(body_array_t *p_b, FILE *f){
00261   body_array_it_t it;
00262   for (body_array_it_Initialize(&it, p_b);
00263        body_array_it_Is_valid(&it);
00264        body_array_it_Go2Next(&it)){
00265     body_array_it_Display_body(&it, f);
00266   }
00267 }

00273 /*********************************************************************************************
00274    body_array_Get_mem_used
00275 *********************************************************************************************/
00276 long body_array_Get_mem_used(body_array_t *p_b){
00277   long res = sizeof(body_array_t);
00278   res += p_b->size_allocated * sizeof(body_t);
00279   return res;
00280 }

00307 /*********************************************************************************************
00308    body_split_array_Initialize

00310 void body_split_array_Initialize(body_split_array_t *p_b,
00311                                  bodies_ind_t initial_size_allocated){
00312   p_b->nb_bodies = 0;
00313 
00314   p_b->p_pos_x = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00315     FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00316   p_b->p_pos_y = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00317     FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00318   p_b->p_pos_z = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00319     FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00320 
00321   p_b->p_values = (VALUES_T *) 
00322     FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(VALUES_T));
00323 
00324   p_b->p_fx = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00325     FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00326   p_b->p_fy = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00327     FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00328   p_b->p_fz = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00329     FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00330 
00331   p_b->p_speed_vectors = (position_t *) 
00332     FMB_malloc_with_check(initial_size_allocated * sizeof(position_t));
00333 
00334   p_b->size_allocated = initial_size_allocated;
00335 }

00338 /*********************************************************************************************
00339    body_split_array_Free
00340 *********************************************************************************************/
00341 void body_split_array_Free(body_split_array_t *p_b){
00342   p_b->nb_bodies = 0;
00343   p_b->size_allocated = 0;
00344 
00345   FMB_free(p_b->p_pos_x);
00346   FMB_free(p_b->p_pos_y);
00347   FMB_free(p_b->p_pos_z);
00348 
00349   FMB_free(p_b->p_values);
00350 
00351   FMB_free(p_b->p_fx);
00352   FMB_free(p_b->p_fy);
00353   FMB_free(p_b->p_fz);
00354 
00355   FMB_free(p_b->p_speed_vectors);
00356 
00357 }

00360 /*********************************************************************************************
00361    body_split_array_Realloc_arrays
00362 *********************************************************************************************/
00363 /* Private function: */
00364 /* WARNING: this function should not too much be called 
00365  * since it may not be efficient when the new_size is greater 
00366  * than the actual size allocated. 
00367  * Indeed the arrays might be allocated one after the other
00368  * in memory and they will all be copied somewhere else 
00369  * in the memory during the 'FMB_realloc_with_check()' call ... */
00370 void body_split_array_Realloc_arrays(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t new_size){
00371 
00372   p_b->p_pos_x = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00373     FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_pos_x,
00374                                       new_size * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00375   p_b->p_pos_y = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00376     FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_pos_y,
00377                                       new_size * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00378   p_b->p_pos_z = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00379     FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_pos_z,
00380                                       new_size * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00381 
00382   p_b->p_values = (VALUES_T *) 
00383     FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_values,
00384                                       new_size * sizeof(VALUES_T));
00385 
00386   p_b->p_fx = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00387     FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_fx,
00388                                       new_size * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00389   p_b->p_fy = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00390     FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_fy,
00391                                       new_size * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00392   p_b->p_fz = (COORDINATES_T *) 
00393     FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_fz,
00394                                       new_size * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00395 
00396   p_b->p_speed_vectors = (position_t *) 
00397     FMB_realloc_with_check(p_b->p_speed_vectors, new_size * sizeof(position_t));
00398   
00399   p_b->size_allocated = new_size;
00400 }

00405 /*********************************************************************************************
00406    body_split_array_ClearFP
00407 *********************************************************************************************/
00408 void body_split_array_ClearFP(body_split_array_t *p_b){
00409   body_split_array_it_t it;
00410   /* Can be accelerated with 'memset'. */
00411   for (body_split_array_it_Initialize(&it, p_b);
00412        body_split_array_it_Is_valid(&it);
00413        body_split_array_it_Go2Next_NoPVS(&it)){
00414 
00415     body_split_array_it_Set_fx(&it, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0);
00416     body_split_array_it_Set_fy(&it, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0);
00417     body_split_array_it_Set_fz(&it, (COORDINATES_T) 0.0);
00418 
00419   }
00420 }

00431 /*********************************************************************************************
00432    body_split_array_Adjust_memory
00433 *********************************************************************************************/
00434 void body_split_array_Adjust_memory(body_split_array_t *p_b){
00435   if (p_b->nb_bodies < p_b->size_allocated){
00436     body_split_array_Realloc_arrays(p_b, p_b->nb_bodies);
00437   }
00438 }

00441 /*********************************************************************************************
00442    body_split_array_Affect
00443 *********************************************************************************************/
00444 void body_split_array_Affect(body_split_array_t *p_target,body_split_array_t *p_src){
00445   body_split_array_Realloc_arrays(p_target, p_src->size_allocated);
00446 
00447   memcpy(p_target->p_pos_x, p_src->p_pos_x, 
00448          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00449   memcpy(p_target->p_pos_y, p_src->p_pos_y, 
00450          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00451   memcpy(p_target->p_pos_z, p_src->p_pos_z, 
00452          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00453 
00454   memcpy(p_target->p_values, p_src->p_values, 
00455          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(VALUES_T));
00456 
00457   memcpy(p_target->p_fx, p_src->p_fx, 
00458          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00459   memcpy(p_target->p_fy, p_src->p_fy, 
00460          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00461   memcpy(p_target->p_fz, p_src->p_fz, 
00462          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(COORDINATES_T));
00463 
00464   memcpy(p_target->p_speed_vectors, p_src->p_speed_vectors, 
00465          p_target->size_allocated * sizeof(position_t));
00466 
00467   p_target->nb_bodies = p_src->nb_bodies;
00468 }

00472 /*********************************************************************************************
00473    body_split_array_Add
00474 *********************************************************************************************/
00475 void body_split_array_Add(body_split_array_t *p_b, 
00476                           body_t *p_body){
00477   if (body_split_array_Is_full(p_b)){
00478     /* We use +1 for the small values of p_b->size_allocated: */
00479     body_split_array_Realloc_arrays(p_b, (p_b->size_allocated + 1) * BODIES_EXTENSION_FACTOR);
00480   }
00481 
00482   Copy_body2body_split_array(p_b, 
00483                              p_b->nb_bodies,
00484                              p_body);
00485   p_b->nb_bodies++;
00486   
00487 }

00490 /*********************************************************************************************
00491    body_split_array_Remove
00492 *********************************************************************************************/
00493 void body_split_array_Remove(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00494   bodies_ind_t k;
00495   
00496   for (k=body_number; k<(p_b->nb_bodies - 1) ;++k){
00497     Copy_body_split_array2body_split_array(p_b, k, p_b, k+1);
00498   }
00499   p_b->nb_bodies--;
00500 }

00503 /*********************************************************************************************
00504    body_split_array_Display

00506 void body_split_array_Display(body_split_array_t *p_b, FILE *f){
00507   body_split_array_it_t it;
00508   for (body_split_array_it_Initialize(&it, p_b);
00509        body_split_array_it_Is_valid(&it);
00510        body_split_array_it_Go2Next(&it)){
00511     body_split_array_it_Display_body(&it, f);
00512   }

00518 /*********************************************************************************************
00519    body_split_array_Get_mem_used
00520 *********************************************************************************************/
00521 long body_split_array_Get_mem_used(body_split_array_t *p_b){
00522   long res = sizeof(body_split_array_t);
00523   bodies_ind_t n = p_b->size_allocated;
00524 
00525   res += n * sizeof(position_t);
00526   res += n * sizeof(VALUES_T);
00527   res += n * sizeof(position_t);
00528   res += n * sizeof(position_t);
00529 
00530   return res;
00531 }

00554 /*********************************************************************************************
00555    bodies_Add_pot_and_forces
00556 *********************************************************************************************/
00557 void bodies_Add_pot_and_forces(bodies_t *p_tgt_bodies, 
00558                                bodies_t *p_src_bodies){
00559   bodies_it_t it_src, it_tgt;
00560 
00561   bodies_it_Initialize(&it_tgt, p_tgt_bodies); 
00562   bodies_it_Initialize(&it_src, p_src_bodies);
00563 
00564   for (; 
00565        bodies_it_Is_valid(&it_tgt);
00566        bodies_it_Go2Next_NoPVS(&it_tgt), bodies_it_Go2Next_NoPVS(&it_src)){
00567     
00568     bodies_it_Set_fx(&it_tgt, bodies_it_Get_fx(&it_tgt) + bodies_it_Get_fx(&it_src));
00569     bodies_it_Set_fy(&it_tgt, bodies_it_Get_fy(&it_tgt) + bodies_it_Get_fy(&it_src));
00570     bodies_it_Set_fz(&it_tgt, bodies_it_Get_fz(&it_tgt) + bodies_it_Get_fz(&it_src));
00571   } /* for */
00572 }
00573

00578 /*********************************************************************************************
00579 **********************************************************************************************
00580 
00581    Scaling of the forces and the potentials with CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR
00582 
00583 **********************************************************************************************
00584 *********************************************************************************************/
00585 
00586 /*********************************************************************************************
00587    bodies_Scale_with_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR
00588 *********************************************************************************************/
00589 #ifdef _USE_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR_
00590 /* We can also use CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR only for the total potential energy ... */
00591 void bodies_Scale_with_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR(bodies_t *p_b){
00592 #ifdef _USE_DSCAL_WITH_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR_
00593 #ifndef _BODIES_SPLIT_DATA_
00594   dscal(3 * bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b),
00595         CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR,
00596         position_Get_p_x(bodies_Get_p_force_vector(p_b, 0)),
00597         1);
00598 #else /* #ifndef _BODIES_SPLIT_DATA_ */
00599   dscal(bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b),
00600         CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR,
00601         p_b->p_fx,
00602         1);
00603   dscal(bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b),
00604         CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR,
00605         p_b->p_fy,
00606         1);
00607   dscal(bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b),
00608         CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR,
00609         p_b->p_fz,
00610         1);
00611 #endif /* #ifndef _BODIES_SPLIT_DATA_ */
00612 #else /* #ifdef _USE_DSCAL_WITH_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR_ */
00613   bodies_it_t it;
00614   for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_b);
00615        bodies_it_Is_valid(&it); 
00616        bodies_it_Go2Next_NoPVS(&it)){
00617 
00618     bodies_it_Set_fx(&it, bodies_it_Get_fx(&it) * CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR);
00619     bodies_it_Set_fy(&it, bodies_it_Get_fy(&it) * CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR);
00620     bodies_it_Set_fz(&it, bodies_it_Get_fz(&it) * CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR);
00621   }
00622 #endif /* #ifdef _USE_DSCAL_WITH_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR_ */
00623 }
00624 #endif /* #ifdef _USE_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR_ */
00625

00645 /*********************************************************************************************
00646 **********************************************************************************************
00647 
00648    Move of the bodies
00649 
00650 **********************************************************************************************
00651 *********************************************************************************************/
00652 
00653 
00654 /*********************************************************************************************
00655    bodies_Move
00656 *********************************************************************************************/
00657 
00658 /* Kick Move : V+= a * dt/2  */ 
00659 void bodies_Kick_Move(bodies_it_t * it,REAL_T dt){
00660   position_t force_vector ;
00661   VALUES_T m = bodies_it_Get_value(it);
00662  
00663   position_Set_x(&force_vector, bodies_it_Get_fx(it));
00664   position_Set_y(&force_vector, bodies_it_Get_fy(it));
00665   position_Set_z(&force_vector, bodies_it_Get_fz(it));
00666                                 
00667   position_Mult_by_real(&force_vector ,1/m );
00668                                     
00669   position_Mult_by_real(&force_vector ,dt/2 );
00670 
00671   position_Add(bodies_it_Get_p_speed_vector(it),&force_vector);
00672 }
00673 
00674 /* Drift  Move:  X +=  V * dt */
00675 void bodies_Drift_Move(bodies_it_t * it,REAL_T dt){
00676   position_t speed_vector ;
00677 
00678   position_Affect(&speed_vector,bodies_it_Get_p_speed_vector(it));
00679                                                             
00680   position_Mult_by_real(&speed_vector ,dt );
00681 
00682   bodies_it_Set_pos_x(it, bodies_it_Get_pos_x(it) + position_Get_x(&speed_vector));
00683   bodies_it_Set_pos_y(it, bodies_it_Get_pos_y(it) + position_Get_y(&speed_vector));
00684   bodies_it_Set_pos_z(it, bodies_it_Get_pos_z(it) + position_Get_z(&speed_vector));
00685 }
